fullText: James Earl Jones and Cicely Tyson bring commanding presence and lived-in authenticity to D.L. Coburn's Pulitzer Prize-winning play about two nursing home residents finding connection through card games.
dtliExcerpt: James Earl Jones and Cicely Tyson bring commanding presence and lived-in authenticity to D.L. Coburn's Pulitzer Prize-winning play about two nursing home residents finding connection through card games.
